about_the_game:
"Tales of Survival Horror" is a chilling survival horror experience that follows Liam, a mechanical engineer thrust into a nightmare. After receiving a mysterious lead about his missing daughter, Liam ventures into a decaying industrial complex, only to discover it overrun by the undead. As he fights to survive, Liam uncovers dark secrets about the facility and the events that led to its downfall.

Key Features

  • Survive the Zombie Apocalypse:
    Face relentless zombie hordes in the shadowy corridors of a massive industrial complex. Use your weapons, tools, and instincts to stay one step ahead of the undead.

  • A Father’s Desperate Search:
    Follow Liam’s emotional journey as he hunts for clues about his missing daughter. The complex holds the answers he seeks—but they may come at a terrifying cost.

  • Dynamic Inventory System:
    Manage your resources strategically. Carry only what you need, craft essential tools, and arm yourself to survive the horrors of the outbreak.

  • Puzzles and Exploration:
    Navigate a labyrinth of locked doors, hidden passages, and environmental puzzles. Unravel the mysteries of the facility while evading the dangers lurking in every shadow.

  • Terrifying Atmosphere:
    Immerse yourself in a dark, suspenseful world with eerie visuals, dynamic lighting, and a haunting soundscape that amplifies the horror.

A Journey of Survival and Sacrifice

The industrial complex holds the key to Liam’s past and his daughter’s fate. Can you guide him through the horrors, solve the mystery, and reunite him with what he’s lost? Or will the nightmare claim him too?

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 ／ Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 with 4GB VRAM ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 ／ Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: "Tales of Survival Horror" is an intense survival horror game where you must fight relentless zombies, solve puzzles, and explore a decaying industrial complex in a desperate search for your missing daughter. Will you uncover the truth, or become part of the nightmare?
